column4: What file extention do I need to look for to get that app run when I double click it? For example . Calculator program
Executable apps don't have an extension, just the execute permission is given to the file.
Thats my biggest hang up with linux. If the app is not in the apllicattion menu. And u know its installed on the computer. How do we get them to work>?
I guess I don't understand the problem fully.
